attributes.action: Make it a requirement that the Insurance companies/brokers verfiy that any applicant requiring insurance with a foreign licence/international driving permit, remains legally entiled to drive in the UK with that licence before he or she is insured
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ther is ample evidence that many UK resident drivers continue to drive with foreign licences or international Driving Permits long after the ONE YEAR that they are permitted by law.

It is disappointing that many of these drivers are helped, and perhaps encouraged, in their part in creating road safety hazard by being provided with insurance year after year (Often by the same Insurance company) and are never challenged or informed that a UK resident can only drive with a foreing driving licence for only one year after entering UK.
